title: Support the wpf toolkit on codeplex or kill it.
body: Either support it or put it out of its misery.  It is a joke at the moment.  Look at the people list, it has 3 people as developers, none of which have visited the site in the last 60 days.  And of the 25 people listed as coordinators, one has been there in the last 2 months.  Support it or kill it.
